name: wiki_read
description:
Retrieves the details about a specific wiki.
A wiki is a collection of markdown text pages that can be used to describe the project or dataset of contained in the attached node.
#### Returns
Returns a JSON object with a `data` key containing the representation of the requested wiki, if the request was successful.

If the request is unsuccessful, an `errors` key containing information about the failure will be returned. Refer to the [list of error codes](#tag/Errors-and-Error-Codes) to understand why this request may have failed.

wiki_id.description: The unique identifier of the wiki.

$ul: **attributes**: The properties of the wiki.
**content_type**: Content type of the wiki (`text/markdown`).
**current_user_can_comment**: Whether the current user is allowed to post comments on this wiki.
**date_modified**: The date and time at which the wiki was last modified, as an iso8601 formatted timestamp.
**extra**: A dictionary containing additional metadata about this wiki, including version information.
**kind**: The type of object.
**materialized_path**: Materialized path to the wiki object.
**name**: The name/title of the wiki page.
**path**: Path to the wiki object.
**size**: Size of the wiki.
**id**: The identifier of the wiki.
**links**: URLs to alternative representations of the wiki.
**download**: The URL to download the content of the wiki.
**info**: A link to the detail page for the wiki.
**self**: A link to the detail page for the wiki.
**relationships**: URLs to other entities or entity collections that have a relationship to the wiki.
**comments**: A relationship to the comments related to this wiki.
**node**: A relationship to the associated node.
**user**: A relationship to the user associated with this wiki.
**type**: The type identifier of the wiki (`wikis`).
